access.requirement: Pick up Serpent Hunter before fight

parryable.note: Immune to critical attacks, stance break only causes brief stun

multiplayer.note: Cooperators can only enter when boss HP bar is visible

tips: Use provided Serpent-Hunter Great Spear
Check equipment load after equipping spear
Use Mimic Tear with Serpent-Hunter for maximum effectiveness

Be sure to pick up the Serpent-Hunter Great Spear from the corpse at the start of the boss chamber. This weapon manifests a blade of light with each attack, significantly extending its range and allowing you to hit both phases of the boss from outside the magma pool.

The Serpent primarily attacks with lunging strikes and bites. It can also perform a special grab animation where it slams you down twice, though it only deals damage once. Occasionally, the Serpent raises its head and slams its chin onto the ground, sending magma flying in a wide arc. You can dodge roll this or block this attack to minimize damage.

If you're using the Serpent-Hunter, consistently poke the Serpent between its attacks. Repeated strikes to its head will briefly stagger the Serpent, giving you a valuable window for uninterrupted attacks.
